official_title: A concurrent resolution recognizing September 3, 1983, as the two hundredth anniversary of the signing of the Treaty of Paris.

summary.text: Proclaims September 3, 1983, a day of national celebration of the 200th anniversary of the signing of the Treaty of Paris.
